title: Mojave National Preserve: Ranger Programs
body: Ranger Programs        NPS/Anne Maasberg-Spillane   Â    Ranger Programs  Table Talks  Kelso Depot Visitor Center: Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays ask at the front desk for times and topics Hole-in-the-Wall Information Center: Sundays, upon request   Ranger Programs Kelso Dunes Ranger Walk Saturdays at 11:00am through April 16, 2016 Sundays at 11:00am through March 27, 2016 Meet at the Kelso Dunes Trailhead An easy walk and talk about the Kelso Dunes   The Petroglyph Walk Saturdays at 3:00pm through April 16, 2016 Meet at the Hole-in-the-Wall Information Center A leisurely walk to the Hole-in-the-Wall petroglyphs Rock Spring Ranger Walk Fridays at 3:00pm through April 15, 2016 Meet at the Rock Spring Loop Trailhead A pleasant 1 mile loop hike to the historic springs along Mojave Trail. Note: There will be no Ranger Programs on December 25th, Christmas Day  Hole-in-the-Wall Evening Program Saturdays at 7:30pm through March 2016 Meet at the Hole-in-the-Wall Information Center Join Ranger Roland for a slideshow of some of the Preserve's highlights Hole-in-the-Wall Nature Walk Sundays at 9:00am through April 24, 2016 Join Mojave volunteers to learn about the unique plants and animals near Hole-in-the-Wall
